alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Maury; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 1:48PM CDT until June 29 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Marshall County in Middle Tennessee... Central Maury County in Middle Tennessee... Southern Williamson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 147 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fairview to 9 miles east of Thompson`s Station, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Spring Hill, Thompson`s Station, Chapel Hill, Santa Fe, Williamsport, I-65 East Of Columbia and Leipers Fork. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
